mapper.select: SELECT UR.UR_NO, UR.U_USERNAME, UR.S_NOSTART, S1.S_NAME S_NAMESTART, UR.S_NOLAST, S2.S_NAME S_NAMELAST, UR.B_NO, UR.UR_DATE, UR.UR_STATE FROM UR JOIN S S1 ON UR.S_NOSTART=S1.S_NO JOIN S S2 ON UR.S_NOLAST=S2.S_NO WHERE U_USERNAME=#{u_username} AND UR_STATE IN(0,1)

SELECT UR.UR_NO, UR.U_USERNAME, UR.S_NOSTART, S1.S_NAME S_NAMESTART, UR.S_NOLAST, S2.S_NAME S_NAMELAST, UR.B_NO, UR.UR_DATE, UR.UR_STATE, B.C_USERNAME FROM UR JOIN S S1 ON UR.S_NOSTART=S1.S_NO JOIN S S2 ON UR.S_NOLAST=S2.S_NO JOIN B ON UR.B_NO = B.B_NO WHERE UR_NO=#{ur_no} AND UR_STATE IN(0,1)
